titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located in Bridgeport, Connecticut, as the "Brien McMahon Federal Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2937)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-513.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 161.

action.text: Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 439.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/25/1994--Introduced. Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 915 Lafayette Boulevard in Bridgeport, Connecticut, as the Brien McMahon Federal Building.
